forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Labor Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a soothing calm blankets the city, with the horizon stretching out clear and inviting. The gentle southwesterly breeze, lightly rustling through the streets, carries the warm scent of the Bay. Tonight's low, hovering around a comfortable 58, makes for a pleasant stroll or a cozy evening on the balcony, if you happen to have one. The sky, untroubled by fog, offers a generous view of twinkling lights and the understated charm of the city's architecture.

Looking ahead to Labor Day, a radiant optimism fills the air. The forecast hints at a sunny embrace, with temperatures nudging close to 72 before retreating slightly in the afternoon. Expect a breezy west-southwest wind that sweeps in at a brisk pace—perfect for a leisurely bike ride along the Embarcadero or an afternoon at Golden Gate Park. Dress in layers; a light sweater or jacket may be your perfect companion as the sun arcs across the sky and the evening air cools. Embrace the day, whether by sipping coffee at a quiet café or meandering through the vibrancy of local art galleries; it’s a splendid opportunity to savor what the city has to offer.
